title: Reproducibilitea Sheffield Reboot
text:
Reproducibilitea Sheffield is back!
This site will hold details of up-coming Journal Clubs and provides links to useful resources.
To stay abreast of up-coming events you can either sign up to the mailing list or subscribe to the RSS feed.

title: About
text:
Welcome to the Reproducibilitea Sheffield Blog. This site details up-coming journal clubs and summaries of the discussions held at previous Journal Clubs. We aim to hold one Journal Club roughly every month where a topical paper on Open Research will be discussed, it would be great if people are able to read the paper before hand and note down what they liked and disliked about it and topics for discussion, but if you haven’t time don’t worry, a brief summary will be given at the start.
To find out more about these journal clubs please visit the ReproducibiliTea - Journal Clubs for Open Science website.

title: Links
text: Useful sites, if you have suggestions please get in touch, you may also wish to join the Reproducibilitea Sheffield Mailing List.

title: Links
text:
Suggested Articles
There is a dedicated Zotero library for Reproducibilitea Journal Clubs. You can add articles that fit the remit or search for articles to discuss. Find out more here and browse articles here.

Easing Into Open Science: A Guide for Graduate Students and Their Advisors
